title: SCP-CN-3320
content:

[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[div class="header-container-ex"]]
[[include component:image-block name=https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/jianqiaohehongdezuozheye/%E6%8F%92%E5%9B%BE-%E4%BD%A0%E7%88%B8%E5%A6%88%E4%B8%8D%E6%98%AF%E4%BD%A0%E4%BA%B2%E7%94%9F%E7%88%B6%E6%AF%8D|caption=Photo of iteration SCP-CN-3320-1-706 together with SCP-CN-3320-2. | width=300px|align=right]]
[[div class="header-info"]]
[[div class="header-info-flex"]]
[[div class="text-item"]]
[[size 90%]]##grey|**Item #:**##[[/size]]

[[size 220%]]**CN-3320**[[/size]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="text-item"]]
[[size 90%]]##grey|**Object Class:**##[[/size]]

[[size 220%]]**Archived**[[/size]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


**Special Containment Procedures:** Proceed with Procedure SCP-CN-3320-α until X=6570.

**Description:** SCP-CN-3320 is an American family comprised of SCP-CN-3320-X and SCP-CN-3320-2, who live at ████ Street, ████ City, ████ Province, China.

SCP-CN-3320-X are the parents of SCP-CN-3320-2, Foundation employees  ████ and  ████ Smith. Their anomalous properties manifest - since the birth of their second child, SCP-CN-3320-2-2 - in Procedure SCP-CN-3320-α, which occurs daily:

||~ Time ||~ SCP-CN-3320-α Node ||~ SCP-CN-3320-1-X Status ||
|| 6:30 AM || All SCP-CN-3320-2 instances leave their home || Alive ||
|| 7:00 AM || SCP-CN-3320-1-X voluntarily leave their home's surveillance range || Alive ||
|| 7:05 AM || A Foundation vehicle delivers SCP-CN-3320-(X+1) into the home's vicinity.  || Alive ||
|| 7:10 AM || SCP-CN-3320-1-X will encounter SCP-CN-3320-(X+1). During this period, SCP-CN-3320-X will lose their intelligence and disobey protocol in an attempt to reach SCP-CN-3320-2's location. It is believed that this phenomenon, like their short life cycle, is a defect of BZHR-synthesized humans. || Alive, acting on instinct ||
|| 7:15 AM || SCP-CN-3320-X expire from the Foundation's vehicle, allowing SCP-CN-3320-(X+1) to take over SCP-CN-3320-X's life until the next Procedure SCP-CN-3320-α cycle. || Dead ||

SCP-CN-3320-2 are not anomalous.

**July 39, 2015 Special Containment Procedures Update:** The maximum of X has been raised to 6574, at the unanimous request of Site-CN-██ staff.
